name: Funguy hunters demo
description:
This is a demo version of Funguy Hunters. Full game might be free, or not. Controls are found in Options Menu . If you want you could just play with Mouse, LMB = Move, and  Confirm. RMB =Menu, and cancel. 

There are a few mistakes I have already caught and, will fix those mistakes that  I found were spelling, an item not working properly, and a house problems in the town.

It is hard for me to spot mistake myself. So please help me out let me know of other possible mistakes. Thank you!

update 1.0 of demo includes- fewer spelling mistakes, all the items work now, the player transitions fixed. battle error fixed. Also added ATB under enemies when ATB battle mode is on.

If you enjoy please donate. it is not required. Is helpful though.
